    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the SPI interface

      • list

        public static String[] list()
        Lists all available SPI interfaces
        Returns:
        String array

      • settings

        public void settings(int maxSpeed,
                     int dataOrder,
                     int mode)
        Configures the SPI interface
        Parameters:
        maxSpeed - maximum transmission rate in Hz, 500000 (500 kHz) is a resonable default
        dataOrder - whether data is send with the first- or least-significant bit first (SPI.MSBFIRST or SPI.LSBFIRST, the former is more common)
        mode - SPI.MODE0 to SPI.MODE3

      • transfer

        public byte[] transfer(byte[] out)
        Transfers data over the SPI bus
        Parameters:
        out - bytes to send
        Returns:
        bytes read in (array is the same length as out)

      • transfer

        public byte[] transfer(String out)
        Transfers data over the SPI bus
        Parameters:
        out - string to send
        Returns:
        bytes read in (array is the same length as out)

      • transfer

        public byte[] transfer(int out)
        Transfers data over the SPI bus
        Parameters:
        out - single byte to send
        Returns:
        bytes read in (array is the same length as out)
